availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert M. Scott (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah "Sally" Rogers Scott in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in February 1854. Father of Samuel Scott and John Scott. Married to Martha Ashbridge Scott on February 28, 1864. Father of William J. Scott. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Caldwell County in 1850. Household owned one additional enslaved person in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.
